name: @poshplum/zoned-cls
description: Zoned continuation-local storage for browser and node

scripts.package: yarn pack && cd .unpacked && rm -rf packaged && tar -xvzf ../zoned-cls*.tgz && cd ..
scripts.ci: yarn run lint && yarn run format && yarn run promisetest && yarn run test:single && yarn run test-node
scripts.karma-jasmine:autoclose: yarn run karma-jasmine:single && yarn run ws-client
scripts.karma-jasmine-phantomjs:autoclose: yarn run karma-jasmine:phantomjs && yarn run ws-client
scripts.test: yarn run tsc && concurrently "yarn run tsc:w" "yarn run ws-server" "yarn run karma-jasmine"
scripts.test:es2015: yarn run tsc && concurrently "yarn run tsc:w" "yarn run ws-server" "yarn run karma-jasmine:es2015"
scripts.test:phantomjs: yarn run tsc && concurrently "yarn run tsc:w" "yarn run ws-server" "yarn run karma-jasmine:phantomjs"
scripts.test:phantomjs-single: yarn run tsc && concurrently "yarn run ws-server" "yarn run karma-jasmine-phantomjs:autoclose"
scripts.test:single: yarn run tsc && concurrently "yarn run ws-server" "yarn run karma-jasmine:autoclose"
scripts.test-dist: concurrently "yarn run tsc:w" "yarn run ws-server" "karma start karma-dist-jasmine.conf.js"
scripts.test-mocha: yarn run tsc && concurrently "yarn run tsc:w" "yarn run ws-server" "karma start karma-build-mocha.conf.js"
scripts.bazel:format: find . -type f \( -name "*.bzl" -or -name WORKSPACE -or -name BUILD -or -name BUILD.bazel \) ! -path "*/node_modules/*" ! -path "./build/*" | xargs buildifier -v --warnings=attr-cfg,attr-license,attr-non-empty,attr-output-default,attr-single-file,constant-glob,ctx-actions,ctx-args,depset-iteration,depset-union,dict-concatenation,duplicated-name,filetype,git-repository,http-archive,integer-division,load,load-on-top,native-build,native-package,out-of-order-load,output-group,package-name,package-on-top,positional-args,redefined-variable,repository-name,same-origin-load,string-iteration,unsorted-dict-items,unused-variable

author: various including Brian Ford
